entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-03-24
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Analyzer: Prefer Task.FromResult over Task.Run(() => value) #67123
  • Official build sometimes fails building mono.workloads #67117
  • Suboptimal codegen for `default(SomeValueType)` #67116
  • Incorrect DateTimeFormat for nb-NO in Blazor WebAssembly #67115
  • Profiler.Tests.GCBasicTests test failure #67106
  • Potential BSOD in Libraries Test Run release coreclr windows x64 Release #67105
  • Benchmark Dotnet AOT build failing with exit 1 #67098
    7.0.0
  • SEGFAULT due to tiered compilation on 32 bit RASPBIAN .net 6.0 Builds #67102
  • Microsoft.Extensions.Hosting.WindowsServices.WindowsServiceHelpers.IsWindowsService crashes when started as service #67093
  • Building Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection.Abstractions fails in VS #67091
  • [API Proposal]: Make `Type.GetTypeFromHandleUnsafe` public #67090
    7.0.0
  • [QUIC] Publish S.N.Quic tests and runtime in our public pipeline artifacts #67089
  • System Timer with 1 millisecond interval. #67088
  • NullReferenceException in System.Reflection.Emit.SignatureHelper.AddOneArgTypeHelper when using ILGenerator.EmitCall on an interface method with 'in' arguments. #67084
  • Test failure baseservices\\threading\\regressions\\beta2\\437017\\437017.cmd #67083
  • Regressions in System.Text.Json.Document.Tests.Perf_EnumerateArray #67101
  • HttpClient SendAsync leaks when posting ByteArrayContent from a delegate #67096
  • Use framework provided by the SDK #67080
    7.0.0
  • MissingMethodException: The method 'System.Void System.IO.Packaging.Package::.cctor()' has no implementation. #67079
  • OSR stress failure in System.Diagnostics.DiagnosticsSource.Tests #67078
    7.0.0
  • Test failure System.Diagnostics.Metrics.Tests.MetricsTests.PassingVariableTagsParametersTest #67077
  • Test failure System.Net.Security.Tests.ServerAsyncAuthenticateTest.ServerAsyncAuthenticate_EachSupportedProtocol_Success(protocol: Ssl3) #67076
  • Test failure Regressions\\coreclr\\1514\\InterlockExchange\\InterlockExchange.cmd #67074
  • [API Proposal]: System.Diagnostics.Activity: Enumeration API #67072
    7.0.0
  • Assertion failure in System.IO.Tests.FileSystemWatcherTest.VerifyExpectedPaths brings down tests #67071
  • System.IO.Tests.File_Move_Tests.File_Move_Multiple_From_Watched_To_Unwatched_Mac failed #67070

Closed

  • (Should we) Provide implementations for {RSA,DSA,ECDsa}.HashData(?) #66228
    Future
  • System.Net test suites asserts in CI on ArrayBuffer.Discard #43686
    7.0.0
  • JIT Intristics for typeof(T).IsX #67113
  • Microsoft.NetCore.Targets 6.0.0 - No Stable Version #67099
  • Disabled roslyn-analyzers subscription #67068
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Authenticated ciphers should distigush between mismatched tag and failure #67082
  • Alternative option to Thread.Abort() #66943
  • ClientAsyncAuthenticate_MismatchProtocols_Fails - fails with ObjectDisposedException #2352
    Future
  • Test failure System.Net.Security.Tests.ClientAsyncAuthenticateTest.ClientAsyncAuthenticate_MismatchProtocols_Fails(clientProtocol: Tls12, serverProtocol: Ssl3, expectedException: typeof(System.Security.Authentication.AuthenticationException)) #67075
  • Sync stream serialization not handling IAsyncEnumerable correctly #66687
    7.0.0
  • DeflateStream.ReadAsync disregards Memory<byte> buffer size #67092
  • System.Text.Json ReferenceHandler test failures when enabling async in tests #66727
    7.0.0
  • How to calculate percentile using System.Diagnostics.Metrics.Histogram #66592
    7.0.0
  • An exception is thrown when getting PrinterSettings.InstalledPrinters #66186
  • Caching of SCHANNEL_CRED may lead to SslStream using expired certificate chain #43879
    Future
  • An error occurs when an expression is used as a parameter to a generic attribute constructor. #67085
  • [mono] instructions for running tests on windows using Mono with release/6.0 branch #63189
  • Coding Style: Using 'new()' without the type on the left-hand side #53369
    7.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Refactor HandleCollectionsAsync to an xunit Theory #67126
    area-System.Text.Json, 7.0.0
  • Enable emitting intrinsics for System.Numerics.Vector<T> on arm64 #67125
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • [perf] Set job name for the performance jobs #67124
    area-Infrastructure
  • Exclude throwinnestedtrycatch_il_r from Arm runs #67122
  • [mono][wasm] Store the exception object in a GC handle while it is be… #67121
    arch-wasm, area-VM-meta-mono
  • Load R2R images on osx-arm64 according to Apple's guidelines #67118
    community-contribution
  • Issue at most one connection attempt per request #67114
    area-System.Net.Http, 7.0.0
  • [PERF] Added --logbuildoutput to microbenchmark runs. #67111
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Fix error reporting for objects with unsupported property types #67109
    area-System.Text.Json, 7.0.0
  • Make the cross-component build just another invocation of the build-runtime script #67108
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Ensure serializer reflection-dependency sentinel is accurate #67104
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Text.Json, 6.0.5
  • [release/6.0] Add a --aot-lazy-assembly-load command line option to load assemblies #67103
    Servicing-consider, area-Codegen-AOT-mono, 6.0.x
  • Add EvaluationResult Scheme for arrays. #67095
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Delete unused native code in src/native #67087
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Stabilize summary blobs #67086
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Update fabricbot instructions #67073
    area-Meta

Merged

  • Enable localization for LibraryImportGenerator #67107
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, 7.0.0
  • Implement {Try}HashData on asymmetric algorithms #66349
    area-System.Security
  • Fix typo in a summary comment in SharedAttribute #67120
    area-System.Composition, community-contribution
  • [Android] Re-enable System.Security.Cryptography tests #67057
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Avoid issuing connection attempts for already cancelled requests #66992
    area-System.Net.Http, 7.0.0
  • Delete AssemblyBuilderData and ModuleBuilderData #66996
    area-System.Reflection
  • Delete custom cmake config cache mechanism on Unix #64370
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Fix entry point for EnumPrinters #67081
    area-System.Drawing
  • Fix loop cloning for OSR #67067
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Use stackalloc in System.Xml.Xsl.Runtime.NumberFormatterBase.ConvertToAlphabetic #67003
    area-System.Xml, community-contribution
  • Add a --aot-lazy-assembly-load command line option to load assemblies… #67024
    tenet-performance, area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • Ensure Sync stream serialization is handling IAsyncEnumerable correctly #67035
    area-System.Text.Json, 7.0.0
  • [mono] Ensure exception_message points to a string #66991
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Update the latest node for markdownlint #67060
    area-Infrastructure
  • Fix ReferenceHandler test failures when enabling small buffer async in tests #67041
    area-System.Text.Json, 7.0.0
  • Add timestamp-based expiration to cached SafeFreeCredentials #66334
    area-System.Net.Security
  • CoreCLR runtime tests on Mono Windows x64. #64281
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Improve vectorization of String.Split #64899
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • Update coding-style to include target-typed new() guideline #67061
    area-Meta

Updated

  • Disable multi-level lookup by default #67022
    area-Host, 7.0.0
  • Fix race condition in loading assemblies with composite native images #67000
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Add metrics for caching #66479
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Caching
  • [mono] Fix static virtual calls to generic methods from gshared code #66739
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [debugger][wasm] ValueTypeClass refactoring. #63626
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono, needs-author-action
  • Perform reachability analysis before codegen #66967
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [LoongArch64] coreclr-jit directory #62843
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64, 7.0.0
  • Expose the custom type marshalling types for source-generated interop. #67052
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • PoC TLS resume on Linux client #64369
    area-System.Net.Security, os-linux, 7.0.0
  • Optimize bswap+mov to movbe on xarch #66965
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [Group 4] Enable nullable annotations for `Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.Debug` #66862
    area-Extensions-Logging, community-contribution
  • Remove char[] allocations from RegistryKey #66918
    area-Microsoft.Win32, tenet-performance
  • Optimized string.Replace(char, char) #67049
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • Replace bool[] arrays with Span<bool> in XML deserialization #66914
    area-Serialization, tenet-performance, 7.0.0
  • Replace 2 allocations from string.ToCharArray() with ReadOnlySpan in System.Private.Xml library #67002
    area-System.Xml, community-contribution
  • Add support for creating delegates to static virtual methods #66936
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Add arm64 cross-arch msi installers #67066
    area-Setup
  • [release/6.0] Fix unaligned UTF16 string read in collect tracing EventPipe command. #66828
    Servicing-approved, area-Tracing-coreclr, 6.0.5
  • Enable CA1822 (Mark members as static) analyzer #66333
    area-Meta
  • Cache several char[] allocations in System.Private.Xml library methods #67001
    area-System.Xml, community-contribution
  • [mono] Remove mono-perfcounters.c and most of mono-counters.c #66986
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • add code to read active listeners on FreeBSD #64433
    area-System.Net, os-freebsd, 7.0.0
  • Methods on primitives 65707 #66654
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • [mono][workload] Add workloads for win-arm64 using emulation #65089
    area-Build-mono
  • Don't throw PNSE on QuicImplementationProvider.IsSupported #67036
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Net.Quic
  • Memory containment for `FIELD_LIST` operands on x86 #65803
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • [wasm][debugger] Debuger tests refactor 63667 #63730
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Add reciprocal and SinCos methods to IFloatingPoint #59521
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • [wasm][debugger] Sort properties by protection level in structures. #63339
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono, 7.0.0
  • Add dynamic shim for SSL_CTX_set_options and SSL_set_options #67030
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Add current-outgoing-connect-attempts counter to Sockets #66651
    area-System.Net.Sockets, 7.0.0
  • Multiple enveloped signatures #67010
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • [Mono] Fix warnings to enable W4 on Windows. #66710
    os-windows, area-Build-mono
  • Fix hanging of NamedPipeClientStream when connecting with infinite timeout #66877
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Improve `QuicImplementationProviders.MsQuic.IsSupported` for TLS1.3 On Windows #66019
    area-System.Net.Quic, community-contribution
  • Add IAsyncEnumerable support to TransformManyBlock #49264
    area-System.Threading.Tasks, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • [wasm] Bump emscripten to 3.1.7 #67006
    area-Build-mono
  • [WIP] Refactoring and perf of reflection Invoke #66357
    NO-REVIEW, area-System.Reflection, 7.0.0
